DOC.brief_summary: The objective is to assess the efficacy of Hepatitis B Virus vaccination in a population of IBD patients treated with immunosuppressive medications.
DOC.brief_title: Hepatitis B Vaccine in Patients With Inflammatory Bowel Disease
